get.description:
Returns the general information about all the groups, such as group ID and group manager.

**Note**: This method returns partial group information.

parameters.name: manager
parameters.description: Specifies if the user is a manager or not

requestBody.description: Group request parameters

200.description: Newly created group with the detailed information

post.description: Adds a new group with the group manager, name, and members specified in the request.

Returns the detailed information about the selected group.

**Note**: This method returns full group information.

200.description: Updated group with the detailed information
